match.label: Match
match.description: Determines whether the string matches the specified regular expression

minLen.label: Minimum length
minLen.description: Checks whether string length is equal or greater than provided number

maxLen.label: Maximum length
maxLen.description: Checks whether string length is equal or less than provided number

num.label: Is number
num.description: Checks if a value is a finite number

min.label: Greater or equal
min.description: Checks that provided value is greater or equal to minimum allowed value
min.errorText: Must be greater or equal to {{args.1}}

max.label: Less or equal
max.description: Checks that provided value is less or equal to maximum allowed value
max.errorText: Must be less or equal to {{args.1}}

int.label: Safe integer
int.description: Checks that the provided value is a safe integer [-(2^53 - 1), 2^53 - 1]

precision.label: Precision
precision.description: Checks whether provided value has specified precision

valid.label: Matches schema
valid.decription: Checks whether provided object matches JSON schema
valid.errorText: Object do not match provided schema
